info.title: Supplier Quotation
info.description: This service enables you to read, update, delete and create supplier quotations with reference to a request for quotation from an external system in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service contains header and item. The information is sent in the request as a payload.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update, delete and create supplier quotations with reference to a request for quotation from an external system

values.text: [Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(1A0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1A0 " Link To BP ")

[Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(OA0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OA0 " Link To BP ")

post.description:
